sections.title: How the bladder works
sections.teaser: The bladder is an important organ that you’re only aware of when you really need to go – or when you are not able to control it.

sections.title: Symptoms and causes
sections.teaser: Rushing to the bathroom before something happens or waiting for something to happen – or both. Bladder issues vary and are caused by different medical conditions.

sections.title: Why IC
sections.teaser: Intermittent Catheterization is the recommended method to empty your bladder- both by healthcare providers and people with bladder issues.

sections.title: Establishing sound routines
sections.teaser: Avoid leaks, reduce the risk of complications, and be able to do more. The key is sticking to your IC schedule and ensuring great hygiene.

sections.title: How to use different products
sections.teaser: Wash, clean, catheterize, discard-no matter which catheter you use. View step-by step guides on the catheterization procedure.

sections.title: Work
sections.teaser: Working to live, or living to work? No matter what you do, you should be able to concentrate on your job and not worry about bladder problems.

sections.title: Sport
sections.teaser: Ready, steady, go! Exercise and an active lifestyle is good for everyone.

sections.title: Travel
sections.teaser: To travel is to live.  Pack and plan your way to a great trip without worries.

sections.title: Socializing
sections.teaser: Do you have plans for this evening, tomorrow or the weekend? Be able to enjoy your social calendar while maintaining a healthy IC routine.

sections.title: Sexuality
sections.teaser: Sex and intimacy are important parts of a relationship. Your bladder issues don’t have to stop you from hitting the sheets.

sections.title: Diet & nutrition
sections.teaser: An apple a day keeps the doctor away. Eating right and drinking well is good for your bladder – and for your overall well-being.

sections.title: Finding the right product
sections.teaser: We each have unique needs. That is why we offer a range of catheters so you can find one that fits you and your lifestyle.

sections.title: How to get products
sections.teaser: The steps on how to get the catheters you want

sections.title: Rights and reimbursement
sections.teaser: Your catheters, your choice. Know your rights

sections.title: Facts about reimbursement
sections.teaser: FAQ, common terms and coverage types

sections.title: About us
sections.teaser: Who is Coloplast? Get to know more about what we do besides developing catheters.

sections.title: Innovation
sections.teaser: Thorough testing and quality control are among the requirements that go with the development of each catheter.

sections.title: Contact us
sections.teaser: Do you have questions? We are ready to help you.
